page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LINDA
page.content: Most Saturdays I watch{Chips}on television.This is a programme about two motor cycle policemen and their job. Afterwards I go round to my friend's house and I usually play {Great Britain.} This is a board game. You have to travel to places in Great Britain and the first one to finish wins the game.I have a hot dinner like sausages,potatoes,beans,peas and gravy. In the afternoon I help my mum wash up and then I dry up.Afterwards we usually go to Wisbech to the shops but sometimes we go to Kings Lynn.We went to King's Lynn last time to get my sister's dress and shoes for our Sunday School anniversary.We go there because there are more shops to choose from.
